page.title: 06LONGSTONE BUS DEPOT
page.content: Longstone bus depot is situated at the end of Murrayburn Road. It has 416 drivers and 184 buses. Many people have become bus drivers because of the good wages and the Social Club in the depot. In the club there are snooker tables, gambling machines, darts and televisions. The bus drivers work 8 hours a day for 5 days a week. There is a canteen in the depot. The drivers drive lots of different buses; there are coaches, midi buses and double deckers. It all depends what duty the drivers are on as to what bus they drive. Many buses now have alarms in them so that if the driver is attacked he can call for help. This happens occasionally. Buses are serviced and repaired at Longstone but if they are badly damaged they are sent to Shrubhill.Buses have adverts on them: one covering the bus costs Â£9000/year.
